14351.name: Gracian Anniversary Coins
14351.description: Gracian Anniversary Coins can be used at an Item Merchant in order to receive a reward. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, destroyed nor stored in a private warehouse.

14352.name: Sculpture of Doubt
14352.description: The Sculpture of Doubt possesses a mysterious power left from a dying creature.

14353.description: The Sculpture of Doubt possesses a mysterious power left from a dying creature.

14361.name: Blood Stained Cloth
14361.description: A piece of cloth soaked in the blood of angels and Platinum race that Magister Kaspar asked for.

14362.name: White Cloth
14362.description: A large piece of white cloth given by Magister Kaspar. Stain the cloth with the blood of angels and the Platinum race in the Tower of Insolence.

14363.name: Icarus Sawsword {PvP}
14363.description: It can bestow one of the following three functions, Focus, Health or Light. Increases damage inflicted during PvP, during an attack, cancels a target's enhanced status by more than 1 occasionally. Special Ability: PvP Damage

14364.name: Icarus Disperser {PvP}
14364.description: It can bestow one of the following three functions, Focus, Evasion or Crit. Damage. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Improves the chance of CP recovery during an attack. Special Ability: PvP Damage

14365.name: Icarus Spirit {PvP}
14365.description: It can bestow one of the following three functions, Acumen, Mana Up or Conversion. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Has a chance of canceling more than 1 of a target's enhanced status, or of decreasing a target's Shield Defence during an attack. Special Ability: PvP Damage

14366.name: Icarus Heavy Arms {PvP}
14366.description: It can bestow one of the following three functions, Focus, Health or Light. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Has a chance of increasing Casting Spd. when being attacked. Special Ability: PvP Damage

14367.name: Icarus Trident {PvP}
14367.description: It can bestow one of the following three functions, Anger, Critical Stun or Light. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Improves the chance of additional damage during an attack. Special Ability: PvP Damage

14368.name: Icarus Hammer {PvP}
14368.description: It can bestow one of the following three functions, Anger, Health or Rsk. Focus. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Improves the chance of additional damage during an attack. Special Ability: PvP Damage

14369.name: Icarus Hand {PvP}
14369.description: One ability amongst either Rsk. Evasion, Focus or Haste can be granted. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Improves the chance of CP recovery during an attack. Special Ability: PvP Damage

14370.name: Icarus Hall {PvP}
14370.description: It can bestow one of the follow three functions, Mana Up, Conversion or Acumen. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Has a chance of canceling more than 1 of a target's enhanced status, or of decreasing a target's Shield Defence during an attack. Special Ability: PvP Damage

14371.name: Icarus Spitter {PvP}
14371.description: One ability amongst either Cheap Shot, Guidance or Focus can be granted. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Has a chance of increasing Casting Spd. when being attacked. Special Ability: PvP Damage

14372.name: Icarus Stinger {PvP}
14372.description: Kamael Exclusive Weapon: Icarus Sawsword Conversion. Focus, Health, or Light can be bestowed. When enchanted to 4 or more, there's a chance that party members including yourself will get increased P. Atk., M. Atk., and the amount of received heal and decreased MP consumption per skill during a critical attack. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Has a chance of increasing Atk. Spd. of bows/crossbows during an attack. Special Ability: PvP Damage

14373.name: Icarus Wingblade {PvP}
14373.description: Kamael Exclusive Weapon: Icarus Heavy Arms conversion. It can bestow one of the following three functions, Focus, Health, or Light. Increases damage inflicted during PvP, and decreases the range of bows/crossbows occasionally during an attack or decreases Resistance to attributes. Special Ability: PvP Damage

14374.name: Icarus Shooter {PvP}
14374.description: Kamael Exclusive Weapon: Icarus Spitter Conversion. It can bestow one of the following functions, Cheap Shot, Guidance, or Focus. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Improves the chance of additional damage during an attack. Special Ability: PvP Damage

14375.name: Icarus Dual Sword {PvP}
14375.description: P. Atk. of dual bladed weapons, two-handed swords, two-handed blunt weapons and fighting weapons increases more than the regular one-handed swords when enchanted. When enchanted to 4 or more, increases Critical Attack by 109 and Max HP by 10%. Increases damage inflicted during PvP, and decreases the range of bows/crossbows occasionally during an attack. Special Ability: PvP Damage

14376.name: Icarus Sawsword {PvP} - Focus
14376.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Critical by 111. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Improves the chance of CP recovery during an attack. Special Ability: PvP Damage

14377.name: Icarus Sawsword {PvP} - Health
14377.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Max HP by 25%. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Improves the chance of CP recovery during an attack. Special Ability: PvP Damage

14378.name: Icarus Sawsword {PvP} - Light
14378.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases weight gauge by 20%. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Improves the chance of CP recovery during an attack. Special Ability: Light

14379.name: Icarus Heavy Arms {PvP} - Focus
14379.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Critical by 111. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Improves the chance of additional damage during an attack. Special Ability: PvP Damage

14380.name: Icarus Heavy Arms {PvP} - Health
14380.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Max HP by 25%. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Improves the chance of additional damage during an attack. Special Ability: PvP Damage

14381.name: Icarus Heavy Arms {PvP} - Light
14381.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases weight gauge by 20%. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Improves the chance of additional damage during an attack. Special Ability: Light

14382.name: Icarus Spirit {PvP} - Acumen
14382.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Casting Spd. by 15%. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Has a chance of increasing Casting Spd. when being attacked. Special Ability: PvP Damage

14383.name: Icarus Spirit {PvP} - Mana Up
14383.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Max MP by 30%. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Has a chance of increasing Casting Spd. when being attacked. Special Ability: PvP Damage

14384.name: Icarus Spirit {PvP} - Conversion
14384.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Max MP increases by 60% and decreases Max HP by 40%. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Has a chance of increasing Casting Spd. when being attacked. Special Ability: PvP Damage

14385.name: Icarus Spitter {PvP} - Cheap Shot
14385.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Decreases MP Consumption 4% during a skill attack. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Has a chance of increasing Atk. Spd. of bows/crossbows during an attack. Special Ability: PvP Damage

14386.name: Icarus Spitter {PvP} - Guidance
14386.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Accuracy by 5.32. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Has a chance of increasing Atk. Spd. of bows/crossbows during an attack. Special Ability: PvP Damage

14387.name: Icarus Spitter {PvP} - Focus
14387.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Critical by 116. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Has a chance of increasing Atk. Spd. of bows/crossbows during an attack. Special Ability: PvP Damage

14388.name: Icarus Disperser {PvP} - Focus
14388.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Critical by 116. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Has a chance of canceling more than 1 of a target's enhanced status, or of decreasing a target's Shield Defence during an attack. Special Ability: PvP Damage

14389.name: Icarus Disperser {PvP} - Evasion
14389.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Evasion by 5. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Has a chance of canceling more than 1 of a target's enhanced status, or of decreasing a target's Shield Defence during an attack. Special Ability: Evasion

14390.name: Icarus Disperser {PvP} - Critical Damage
14390.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. P. Atk. by 559 during a critical attack. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Has a chance of canceling more than 1 of a target's enhanced status, or of decreasing a target's Shield Defence during an attack. Special Ability: PvP Damage

14391.name: Icarus Trident {PvP} - Anger
14391.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Decreases HP by 15% while increasing P. Atk. by 78 during a critical attack. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Improves the chance of additional damage during an attack. Special Ability: PvP Damage

14392.name: Icarus Trident {PvP} - Critical Stun
14392.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. There is a 48% chance to Stun target during a critical attack. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Improves the chance of additional damage during an attack. Special Ability: PvP Damage

14393.name: Icarus Trident {PvP} - Light
14393.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases weight gauge by 20%. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Improves the chance of additional damage during an attack. Special Ability: Light

14394.name: Icarus Hammer {PvP} - Anger
14394.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Decreases HP by 15% while increasing P. Atk. by 78 during a critical attack. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Improves the chance of CP recovery during an attack. Special Ability: PvP Damage

14395.name: Icarus Hammer {PvP} - Health
14395.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Max HP by 25%. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Improves the chance of CP recovery during an attack. Special Ability: PvP Damage

14396.name: Icarus Hammer {PvP} - Rsk. Focus
14396.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Critical by 164 when HP drops to 60% or lower. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Improves the chance of CP recovery during an attack. Special Ability: PvP Damage

14397.name: Icarus Hall {PvP} - Mana Up
14397.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Max MP by 30%. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Has a chance of increasing Casting Spd. when being attacked. Special Ability: PvP Damage

14398.name: Icarus Hall {PvP} - Conversion
14398.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Max MP increases by 60% and decreases Max HP by 40%. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Has a chance of increasing Casting Spd. when being attacked. Special Ability: PvP Damage

14399.name: Icarus Hall {PvP} - Acumen
14399.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Casting Spd. by 15%. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Has a chance of increasing Casting Spd. when being attacked. Special Ability: PvP Damage
